{# 
==List of parameters==
 licenses: A list of license code which is available (ie. has count>0)
 count(x): Count of license x
 percent(x): Float number, percent of license x in [0,1]
 total: Total number of licenses.
 freedom_score: Freedom score.
 freedom_url: URL of the XML data file with freedom score data.
 thousandsep: A thousand seperator filter for numbers.
#}
{% for item in licenses %}

{{item}} {{count(item) | thousandsep}} {{ (percent(item)*100) | round(2) }}%
{% endfor %}

Total = {{total | thousandsep}}

Freedom score = {{freedom_score | round(2)}}

<flash>file=World.swf|width=640|height=480|flashvars=?data_file={{ freedom_url }}</flash>
